nodes.text: The Legislature Building, alternatively known as the Corellian Legislature, the Legislature, and a variety of other names during various periods of government, was the seat of government on the planet Corellia. Located on Capitol Square in the Government District of Corellia's capital Coronet City, the Legislature Building served as the seat of government for many different types of government—it served as a house of parliament, a royal council chamber, a corporate boardroom, and the meeting place of the Corellian Council at different times.
